description.value:
Skills: +2 to Energy Weapons, Breach, and Science.

Trait: Field Research

Scouring old world books, crafting theories, using

knowledge to help rebuild civilization is your life's work.

You've successfully predicted outcomes from natural

events and creatures to better help your community to

understand the world outside. But you've learned what

you needed, and now to properly fuel your curiosity; it's

time for field research!

Starting Equipment.

• Human, Ghoul, or Super Mutant Scientist

x1 cloth armor, x1 laser pistol, x2 energy cell, x1 backpack, x1

sleeping bag, x1 one person tent, x3 cram, x2 purified water, x1

diluted RadAway, x1 Rad-X, x1 stimpak, and x50 caps.

• Gen-2 Synth or Robot Scientist

x1 cloth armor, x1 laser pistol, x2 energy cell, x1 backpack, x2

RobCo Quick Fix-it 2.0, x1 Programmer's Digest magazine, x1

data scrubber, and x50 caps
